item.title: David add a quote by Anne Tyler
item.description:
"One sad thing about this world is that the acts that take the most out of you are usually the ones that people will never know about.
(from 'Celestial Navigation')" -- Anne Tyler

item.title: David add a quote by Norman Maclean
item.description: "The world is full of bastards, the number increasing rapidly the further one gets from Missoula, Montana." -- Norman Maclean

item.title: David add a quote by Norman Maclean
item.description: "Eventually, all things merge into one, and a river runs through it. The river was cut by the world's great flood and runs over rocks from the basement of time. On some of the rocks are timeless raindrops. Under the rocks are the words, and some of the words are theirs. I am haunted by waters." -- Norman Maclean

item.title: David add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us." -- Franz Kafka
